sys_script_include.name: CO_Hours_and_status_update_script

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_68fb28941b60101023c27596cc4bcb65
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_486042_se_pjt_tr.CO_Hours_and_status_update_script</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>CO_Hours_and_status_update_script</name><script><![CDATA[var CO_Hours_and_status_update_script = Class.create();
CO_Hours_and_status_update_script.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	calc_hours_status: function(){
		jslog("entered in to callback func");
		total = this.getParameter("sysparm_total");
		taken = this.getParameter("sysparm_taken");
		if (total == ''){
			total = 0;
		}
		if (taken == ''){
			taken = 0;
		}
		jslog("total = " + total + "taken=" + taken);
		if (taken <= total){
			pending = 0;
			status = "Taken";
		} else if (total == 0){
			pending = 0;
			status = "New";
		} else {
			pending = total - taken;
			if (pending == 0){
				status = "Pending";
			} else {
				status = "Partially Taken";
			}
		}
		jslog(pending, status);
		var ps = [pending, status];	
		return ps.toString();	
	},
	
	
    type: 'CO_Hours_and_status_update_script'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-29 01:42:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>68fb28941b60101023c27596cc4bcb65</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CO_Hours_and_status_update_script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SE Project Tracker" source="x_486042_se_pjt_tr">69444e861b10101023c27596cc4bcb20</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="SE Project Tracker">69444e861b10101023c27596cc4bcb20</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_68fb28941b60101023c27596cc4bcb65</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-29 02:42:13</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
